mapper.select: select t.id normIds, t.name,t.calType,b.* from norm t inner join topic_norm a on t.id=a.normId left join (select * from norm_data where meetingId=#{meetingId} and topicId=#{topicId}) b on t.id=b.normId where a.topicId=#{topicId} order by t.id
mapper.sql: from norm t inner join topic_norm a on t.id=a.normId left join (select * from norm_data where meetingId=#{condition.meetingId} and topicId=#{condition.topicId}) b on t.id=b.normId where a.topicId=#{condition.topicId}
